name: HindiGyan
0:
”Alexa, Open Hindi Gyan”
”Alexa, ask Hindi Gyan to teach me Hindi Varnamala”
”Alexa, ask Hindi Gyan to translate Player in Hindi”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hindi gyan
des: Hindi Gyan helps your children take their first step into Hindi language by teaching them the Hindi alphabets also called Hindi Varnamala. It not only helps kids but is also a very good medium to learn hindi for elderly as well.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
